sentences.sContent: The pigment in the upper layer of skin (epidermis) that gives your skin its normal color is called melanin.
sentences.sContent_eng: The pigment in the upper layer of skin (epidermis) that gives your skin its normal color is called melanin.
sentences.sCn: 在浅层皮肤（表皮）中有种色素能让你的皮肤保持其正常的颜色，称为黑色素。

sentences.sContent: Skin color is due to melanin, a pigment produced in the epidermis to protect us from the sun's potentially cancer-causing ultraviolet (UV) rays.
sentences.sContent_eng: Skin color is due to melanin, a pigment produced in the epidermis to protect us from the sun's potentially cancer-causing ultraviolet (UV) rays.
sentences.sCn: 这是一种产生于表皮的色素，能够保护我们免受来自紫外线的侵袭。 紫外线正是来自太阳的潜在致癌物。

trans.tranOther: the outside layer of your skin
